message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm not sure I can meet you halfway. However, I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet at $13500?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you try to get closer to $12000? That would be a more comfortable price for me.
